NEON #WorkWithData Summer Institute

Leah WasserWendy Gram

Organization: NEON

The NEON Institute is a two-week intensive course that focuses on the use of NEON data to ask and answer broad-scale ecological questions. Content focusing on using open science tools and methods, understanding exernal data fundamentals including metadata, uncertainty,validation, calibration and more.

Visit NEON Resource Now

Entry Type: course

License Name: CC-BY

Target Audience: Early-career researchers (postdocs, faculty, grad students)
